    • Constructor Detail

      • Category

        public Category(int id,
        java.lang.String name,
        int parentId,
        boolean used)
        store the categories of an account
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the category as int
        name - the name of the category as String
        parentId - the parentId of this category as int (0 if root)
        used - true if this category is mapped at minimum to one account, false otherwise

      • isUsed

        public boolean isUsed()
        True if an account is associated with this category, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if this category is mapped at minimum to one account, else false

        specifies whether this category is used as an account-category pair or not
